meanings.sent1: The strutters at the parade walked proudly.
meanings.sent2: The group of strutters showed off their confident walk.
meanings.sent3: The strutters in the talent show impressed the audience with their confident steps.
meanings.sent4: She was a strutter, always walking with a sense of self-assurance.
meanings.sent5: The strutters in the fashion show owned the runway with their confident strides.

meanings.definition: A structural member used to support or stiffen a framework.
meanings.sent1: The builder added strong strutters to reinforce the bridge.
meanings.sent2: The strutters in the building provided essential support.
meanings.sent3: The strutters in the house made sure the roof stayed up.
meanings.sent4: The strutters held the structure together like a backbone.
meanings.sent5: The strutters were crucial in keeping the building sturdy and safe.

meanings.definition: A piece of wood or metal used to strengthen or support a structure.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used sturdy strutters to fortify the table.
meanings.sent2: The strutters in the construction project added stability.
meanings.sent3: The strutters in the fence kept it from falling over.
meanings.sent4: The strutters acted like pillars, holding everything in place.
meanings.sent5: The wooden strutters were essential in keeping the structure intact.
